name: Infernal Tiefling
description: The infernal legacy connects tieflings not only to Gehenna but also the Nine Hells and the raging battlefields of Acheron. Horns, spines, tails, golden eyes, and a faint odor of sulfur or smoke are common physical features of such tieflings, most of whom trace their ancestry to devils.

Infernal Legacy.description: You have Resistance to Fire damage. You know the Fire Bolt cantrip. You also always have certain spells prepared and can cast them once per day without expending a spell slot. You can also cast them using spell slots you have of the appropriate level.
